text: The Bubba Gump Shrimp Company is an American seafood restaurant chain. It was inspired by the 1994 film Forrest Gump, based in Houston, Texas, and a division of Landry's Restaurants since 2010. It operates 35 restaurants. It was founded in 1996. Category:American restaurants Category:1996 establishments in the United States
title: Bubba Gump Shrimp Company
